WITH V_TEMP1 AS ( SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN AP.AP_USE = 'N' THEN '사용안함' WHEN AP.AP_USE = 'Y' THEN '사용함' END AS AP_USE_NM , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') NOW_DATE , CASE WHEN AP.AP_DEADLINE = 'N' THEN '진행중' WHEN AP.AP_DEADLINE = 'Y' THEN '마감' END AS DEADLINE , AP.* , P.PM_NAME , U.UI_NAME , CS.SC_CODENM AS TYPENAME ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY AP.AP_KEYNO ORDER BY AP.AP_KEYNO) AS RN FROM T_APPLICAITON_MANAGER AP LEFT JOIN T_PLACE_MANAGER P ON AP.AP_PLACE = P.PM_KEYNO LEFT JOIN T_USERINFO U ON AP.AP_REGNM = U.UI_KEYNO LEFT JOIN T_APPLICAITON_DISCOUNT_SELECT ADS ON AP.AP_KEYNO = ADS.AP_KEYNO LEFT JOIN T_COMMON_CODE_SUB CS ON AP.AP_TYPE = CS.SC_KEYNO WHERE AP_USE != 'D' AND AP.AP_KEYNO = #{AP_KEYNO} ORDER BY AP.AP_KEYNO DESC ) A WHERE A.RN = 1 ) , V_TEMP2 AS ( SELECT LISTAGG(AD_KEYNO,',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AD_KEYNO) AS AD_KEYNO ,AP.AP_KEYNO FROM T_APPLICAITON_MANAGER AP LEFT JOIN T_PLACE_MANAGER P ON AP.AP_PLACE = P.PM_KEYNO LEFT JOIN T_USERINFO U ON AP.AP_REGNM = U.UI_KEYNO LEFT JOIN T_APPLICAITON_DISCOUNT_SELECT ADS ON AP.AP_KEYNO = ADS.AP_KEYNO LEFT JOIN T_COMMON_CODE_SUB CS ON AP.AP_TYPE = CS.SC_KEYNO WHERE AP_USE != 'D' AND AP.AP_KEYNO = #{AP_KEYNO} GROUP BY AP.AP_KEYNO ORDER BY AP.AP_KEYNO DESC ) SELECT A.*,B.AD_KEYNO FROM V_TEMP1 A INNER JOIN V_TEMP2 B ON A.AP_KEYNO = B.AP_KEYNO

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT AP.* , P.PM_NAME , P.PM_FS_KEYNO , '/resources/img/upload/'||FS_FOLDER,FS_THUMBNAIL||'.'||FS_EXT FS_PATH , U.UI_NAME ,MAX(ASM_ENDT) OVER(PARTITION BY AP.AP_KEYNO ORDER BY AP.AP_KEYNO) AS END_DATE , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY AP.AP_KEYNO ORDER BY AP.AP_KEYNO) AS RN FROM T_APPLICAITON_MANAGER AP
